title: Tier1 is looking to expand into League of Legends!
body:
Hello Everyone. Tier1 is a gaming organisation currently looking for members to join as League of Legends players. We decided to make this push with the success we currently are having with the csgo team. We will provide everything you need from entry's to jerseys.
We don't want to have to tell you guys what to do. So I am looking for players that are at a high skill level and knowledge about the competitive scene to play in this organisation. What your requirements need to be is as follows.

- Mature is a big one. If you can not comply to follow rules of your captain or are toxic in game. Please do not bother.

- Rank must be Diamond+ as we are looking to put you guys into OCS and further events.

- Your IGN needs to be respectful

- You need to have an open timetable for events and practice

- Must speak English 

- Must be able to have fun!

We are currently looking for a:

Top Laner
Jungler
Support

If you meet all the above requirements Please reply to this thread with the following information:

IGN:
RANK:
BIO:
PREVIOUS LoL EXP:
COMPETITIVE EXP:
LOCATION:

Thank you for your time in reading this. Hopefully you can join the squad one day  

Kind Regards,
Trouble

replies.body:
IGN: kazarn
RANK: d3
BIO: 20 year old top laner, full time uni student. my only goal with league is to get better
PREVIOUS LoL EXP: played since s1 on and off, was d1 most of s5
COMPETITIVE EXP: none
LOCATION: queensland

IGN: Ryuku
RANK: Diamond 5
BIO:  This season I want to hit challenger or at least high master. I'm 16 next month and play adc.
PREVIOUS LoL EXP: Been playing for 3 years. Season 3 I was bronze, season 4 I was gold and season 5 I reached diamond 3.
COMPETITIVE EXP: Played with some semi-competitive teams in tournaments like NZGC. I also played on Enclave which was a team that was aiming for OCS 
LOCATION: New Zealand
I'm sorry I don't quite understand. If you wondering why I said added by TroubleAU it was so no one gets confused with who to add and who not to add.

IGN: Archfugle
Rank: D3
Bio: i hit diamond 3 on my main which got banned only a few days ago so im not stuck on this account haha (got screenshots :P). but yeah im a diamond 3 Adc main looking for a competitive team to give my all in and work to be the best with. Im also 17.
PREVIOUS lol EXP: Played since s3 and have been climbing two leagues per  season, can play every champ to a very high standard. Looking to get challenger this season.
COMPETITIVE EXP: Played in multiple ranked team including Enclave and Alura gaming aswell as subbing for some high rank teams and playing in other semi serious teams.
LOCATION: Victoria
